meanings.definition: To lead or be in charge of a team or group as a captain.
meanings.sent1: She captained her soccer team to victory in the championship.
meanings.sent2: The coach captained the players during the crucial match.
meanings.sent3: The cat captained the group of kittens during playtime.
meanings.sent4: His confidence captained the team through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse captained the ships safely to shore.
